nodes.text: Telgordo Travel was a company that operated a fleet of starships, including the passenger liner, Telgordo's Pride. Telgordo Travel was a subsidiary of the Galactic Empire, and one of the most influential shipping firms in the galaxy that was run by some of the most trusted men and women in the Empire. As a result, Telgordo Travel vessels did not have to stop at checkpoints, and their passengers were generally rich Imperials and their retinues.
